title: Salesforce CEO calls AI a 'commodity feature', says the technology bolsters enterprise software
description: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff told CNBC's Jim Cramer how his company uses AI.
content: As Wall Street worries that advancements in artificial intelligence will hurt enterprise software companies, Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff told CNBC's Jim Cramer a large language model is "just a commo… [+2407 chars]
